data.eml:eml: New species and new records of Ampithoidae (Peracarida: Amphipoda) from Australian Waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hughes, Lauren E., Peart, Rachael A. (2013): New species and new records of Ampithoidae (Peracarida: Amphipoda) from Australian Waters. Zootaxa 3719 (1): 1-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3719.1.1
